SEARCH

Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.messages

package it.polimi.ingsw.network.messages
  • Class
    Description
    AchievementMessage
    Message used to send the achievements to the client
    AddToChatMessage
    Message used to send a message to the chat.
    AvailableLobbiesMessage
    Message used to send the available lobbies to the client.
    CardInHandMessage
    Message used to send the cards in the hand of the player.
    CatchPingMessage
    Message used to notify the server that the client is still alive.
    ChatMessage
    Message used to send the chat message to the server, which will forward it to the receivers.
    ColorRequestMessage
    Message used to request the colors to the client.
    ColorResponseMessage
    Message used to send the color chosen by the player.
    CommonCardUpdateMessage
    Message used to update the common cards on the table.
    DrawFromBoardMessage
    Message used to notify the server that the player wants to draw a card from the board.
    DrawMessage
    Message used to notify the server that the player wants to draw from a deck
    ErrorMessage
    Message used to send an error message to the client.
    GameStateMessage
    Message used to send the game state to the client.
    GenericMessage
    Message used to send a generic message to the client.
    LobbyIndexMessage
    Message used to send the index of the lobby chosen by the player.
    LoginResponseMessage
    Message used to notify the server that the player wants to log in.
    Message
    This class is the abstract class for all the messages that are exchanged between the server and the client.
    MessageType
     
    NumPlayerRequestMessage
    Message used to request the number of players of the lobby.
    NumPlayerResponseMessage
    Message used to send the server the size of the lobby the player wants to create.
    OpponentsMessage
    Message used to send his opponents to the client.
    PingMessage
    Message used to send a ping to the client.
    PlaceMessage
    Message used to notify the server that the player wants to place a card.
    PlaceStarterRequestMessage
    Message used to notify the server that the player wants to place his starter card.
    PlayerBoardUpdateMessage
    Message sento to the client to update his board or one of his opponents.
    PlayerStateMessage
    Message used to send the state of a player to the client.
    ReconnectionMessage
    Message notify the client of the updates that happened while he was disconnected.
    ReconnectLobbyIndexMessage
    Message used to request the server to reconnect to a specific lobby.
    ScoreUpdateMessage
    Message used to send the updated score of a player to the client.
    SetPrivateAchievementMessage
    Message used to notify the server that the player wants to set his private achievement.
    StarterCardMessage
    Message used to send the starter card to the client.
    UpdateCardMessage
    Message used to update a card in the hand of the client.
    UpdateDeckMessage
    Message used to send the client an update on the deck.
    UsernameRequestMessage
    Message used to request a username to the client.
    WaitingReconnectionMessage
    Message used to notify the client that the server is waiting for the reconnection of at least one player.
    WinnerMessage
    Message used to declare the winner(s) of the game.
